pr_title: Return BadRequest for malformed URI requests.

timeline.message: Added test to check URI specification
Added test to check URI specification

timeline.bodyText:
Since you are not creating beans in this test. You don't need to set spec.name. We typically use spec.name to avoid bean pollution.
Environment.TEST is automatically inferred.
Thus, you could just write EmbeddedServer embeddedServer = ApplicationContext.run(EmbeddedServer)
timeline.author: sdelamo
